moves.name: X Sp. Atk
moves.effect: Sharply raises the user’s Sp. Atk.

moves.name: Let’s Keep Cool!
moves.effect: Raises the Sp. Def and Speed of all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: Bubble Beam
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of lowering the target’s Speed.

passives.name: Lithe
passives.description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting paralyzed.

passives.name: First Aid 2
passives.description: Restores a bit of the Pokémon’s HP once during battle when the Pokémon is in a pinch.

passives.name: Revenge Boost 1
passives.description: Has a small chance of charging the user’s move gauge by one when the user is hit by an attack move.
